description: This file defines the RDKShell class, which provides a plugin interface for managing application windows, display properties, and system events within the RDK platform. It includes method declarations, event definitions, internal classes for event listening and screenshot capture, and constants for method and event names.

classes.name: RDKShellApiRequest
classes.description: Structure representing an API request with a name and associated JSON request data.

classes.name: RDKShell
classes.description: Main plugin class handling window management, events, and system interactions within the RDK platform.

classes.name: RdkShellListener
classes.description: Listener class for handling RDKShell application events such as launch, suspend, focus change, and system warnings.

classes.name: MonitorClients
classes.description: Monitor class implementing plugin notification interfaces to track plugin lifecycle events.

classes.name: ScreenCapture
classes.description: Implementation of ICapture interface for screen capturing functionality.

classes.name: TaskQueue
classes.description: Thread-safe queue for managing tasks to be executed within the shell.

classes.name: PluginData
classes.description: Holds metadata about the plugin class.

classes.name: PluginStateChangeData
classes.description: Handles state change events for the plugin, including connection management and event processing.

methods.name: notify
methods.description: Triggers a specified event with associated parameters.

methods.name: pluginEventHandler
methods.description: Handles incoming plugin events from other components.

methods.name: launchRequestThread
methods.description: Processes launch requests asynchronously in a dedicated thread.

methods.name: moveToFrontWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for moving an application to the front.

methods.name: moveToBackWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for moving an application to the back.

methods.name: moveBehindWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for positioning an application behind another.

methods.name: setFocusWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for setting focus to a specific application.

methods.name: getFocusedWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for retrieving the currently focused application.

methods.name: addKeyInterceptWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for adding a key intercept for specific key codes and modifiers.

methods.name: addKeyInterceptsWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for adding multiple key intercepts.

methods.name: removeKeyInterceptWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for removing a key intercept.

methods.name: addKeyListenersWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for adding key event listeners to a client.

methods.name: removeKeyListenersWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for removing key event listeners.

methods.name: addKeyMetadataListenerWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for adding key metadata listeners.

methods.name: removeKeyMetadataListenerWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for removing key metadata listeners.

methods.name: injectKeyWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for injecting a key event.

methods.name: generateKeyWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for generating a key sequence.

methods.name: getClientsWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for retrieving list of clients.

methods.name: getZOrderWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for retrieving Z-order of clients.

methods.name: getHolePunchWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for checking if hole punch is enabled.

methods.name: scaleToFitWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for scaling application to fit display.

methods.name: launchApplicationWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for launching an application by call sign.

methods.name: suspendApplicationWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for suspending an application by call sign.

methods.name: getAvailableTypesWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for retrieving available client/application types.

methods.name: getSystemMemoryWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for retrieving system memory info.

methods.name: getSystemResourceInfoWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for retrieving system resource info.

methods.name: showFullScreenImageWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to display a full-screen image.

methods.name: hideFullScreenImageWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to hide the full-screen image.

methods.name: launchFactoryAppShortcutWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to launch factory app shortcut.

methods.name: launchResidentAppWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to launch a resident app.

methods.name: getKeyRepeatsEnabledWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to get if key repeats are enabled.

methods.name: setTopmostWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to set a client as topmost.

methods.name: getVirtualDisplayEnabledWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to check if virtual display is enabled.

methods.name: getLastWakeupKeyWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to get last wakeup key info.

methods.name: getLogsFlushingEnabledWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to check if log flushing is enabled.

methods.name: getBlockedAVApplicationsWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to get list of blocked AV applications.

methods.name: getGraphicsFrameRateWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to get graphics frame rate.

methods.name: setGraphicsFrameRateWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to set graphics frame rate.

methods.name: restoreWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to restore system from hibernate (if enabled).

ctags.name: Name
ctags.pattern: /^                virtual const TCHAR* Name() const override { return "ScreenCapture"; }$/
